//listing of all techniques and passes with embedded asm listings 

technique TSM3
{
    pass P
    {
        vertexshader = 
            asm {
            
//
            // Generated by Microsoft (R) D3DX9 Shader Compiler 9.15.779.0000
                vs_3_0
                dcl_position v0  // IN<0,1,2,3>
                dcl_texcoord v1  // IN<4,5>
                dcl_position o0
                dcl_texcoord o1.xy
            
            #line 42 "c:\Documents and Settings\Zaknafein\My Documents\Visual Studio 2005\Projects\Bloom\Media\Shaders\HighPass.fx"
                mov o0, v0  // ::VS<0,1,2,3>
                mov o1.xy, v1  // ::VS<4,5>
            
            // approximately 2 instruction slots used
            
};

        pixelshader = 
            asm {
            
//
            // Generated by Microsoft (R) D3DX9 Shader Compiler 9.15.779.0000
            //
            // Parameters:
            //
            //   float threshold;
            //
            //
            // Registers:
            //
            //   Name         Reg   Size
            //   ------------ ----- ----
            //   threshold    c0       1
            //
            
                preshader
                neg r1.w, c0.x
                add r0.w, r1.w, (1)
                rcp c2.x, r0.w
            
            // approximately 3 instructions used
            //
            // Generated by Microsoft (R) D3DX9 Shader Compiler 9.15.779.0000
            //
            // Parameters:
            //
            //   float3 luminanceFilter;
            //   sampler2D sampSource;
            //   float threshold;
            //
            //
            // Registers:
            //
            //   Name            Reg   Size
            //   --------------- ----- ----
            //   luminanceFilter c0       1
            //   threshold       c1       1
            //   sampSource      s0       1
            //
            
                ps_3_0
                def c3, 1, 0, 0, 0
                dcl_texcoord v0.xy  // IN<4,5>
                dcl_2d s0
            
            #line 55 "c:\Documents and Settings\Zaknafein\My Documents\Visual Studio 2005\Projects\Bloom\Media\Shaders\HighPass.fx"
                texld r0, v0, s0  // sample<0,1,2>
                dp3 r0.w, r0, c0  // greyLevel<0>
                lrp r1.xyz, c1.x, r0.w, r0  // desaturated<0,1,2>
                add r0.xyz, r1, -c1.x
                mul oC0.xyz, r0, c2.x  // ::PS<0,1,2>
                mov oC0.w, c3.x  // ::PS<3>
            
            // approximately 6 instruction slots used (1 texture, 5 arithmetic)
            
};
    }
}
